    Work

    My work page is my laboratory for my creative projects. No client work is presented here, because I am employed full-time at beMarketing Solutions, as a senior web developer. This is more for fun.

    Moiety – React and Bootstrap 4 UI Kit

    Moiety is a React and Bootstrap 4 UI kit that I developed as a pet project, and for free, personal use of anyone who wants it. The project can be installed via GitHub and installed via NPM in a matter of seconds. Click to learn more on how to install and use Moiety.

    Bootstrap 4 Responsive Timeline

    A good amount of websites like to use timeline-esque styled content. Below is an example of how to create a Bootstrap 4 responsive timeline for yourself. See the Pen Responsive Timeline by benstephan (@benstephan) on CodePen. For more code snippets, check out my Codepen. Contact me for more information.

    Dynamic Phone Number Switch Based on Traffic Source

    Below is a jQuery script developed to switch all phone numbers on a site based on which traffic source the user came from. This specific example uses paid vs. organic as it’s variables but can be adapted to any traffic sources. The inspiration for the script is from Call Rail’s dynamic number switching but was  … Read more
